require(ggplot2)
require(ggmap)
require(maps)

mapdat <- subset(dat, Geocode Status != "U")
bb_coords = c(min(mapdat$X), min(mapdat$Y), max(mapdat$X), max(mapdat$Y))
wake <- get_map(location = bb_coords, zoom=5)

mapPoints <- ggmap(wake) + geom_point(data=mapdat, 
                                     aes(x=X, y=Y),
                                     size=0.8,
                                     color="red",
                                     alpha=0.5)

mapPoints
